actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Miller Act to authorize the payment of attorney fees and litigation cost to a prevailing plaintiff from performance bonds furnished by Federal contractors.

summary.text: Amends the Miller Act to authorize the payment of attorney fees and litigation costs to a prevailing plaintiff from performance bonds furnished by Federal contractors.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Miller Act to authorize the payment of attorney fees and litigation cost to a prevailing plaintiff from performance bonds furnished by Federal contractors.
